Function.Description: The logbase function computes the logarithm of a number to base 10 or whatever optional base you specify.

Brief.Overview: The logbase function computes the logarithm of a number to base 10 or whatever optional base you specify.
Brief.Usage: The logbase function is used to compute the logarithm of a number to base 10 or whatever optional base you specify. The expt function performs the inverse of the logbase function.

Argument.Name: base
Argument.Note: Optional Argument. If not present the default base is 10. If present, the logbase function will compute the logarithm for the specified base.

Syntax.Return: Logarithm of a number to base 10 or whatever optional base you specify.
